Name: Amstelhaven

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: This bar is great. Excellent service, friendly vibe and good selection of drinks. Also has boat parking if your passing by on one. A must to check out when here!

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Cool location directly at the water - had a great evening out with project team and had a dinner for two! Good food and drinks, really charming personnel and quite decent prices. ‚Ä¶

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Sweet potato fries were burnt and still charged to us. They also charged an espresso we didn‚Äôt have and I only noticed it at home. Overall I would have expected more from this location. My feeling is that post corona the service really deteriorated

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Really nice and pleasant place. We had a table right by the lake and the waitresses were super nice. My girlfriend had the regular cheese burger and she loved. I had the vegan one and it was OK (mine could have been better). But, really, it ‚Ä¶

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Nice venue. Great atmosphere. You gonna love it until you order your drink and never have it delivered to your table

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Burgers are far from worth the price. Good place for drinks but would not go again or recommend for food‚Ä¶

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: What stood out the most was the service. Warma nd friendly, always attentive. Thats rare in similar places in Amsterdam. Food portions were sufficient for a grp of 3 -4. The drinks menu was decent with a good list of cocktails. The view was fantastic on a pleasant evening.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Out from the crowd from the city center, but still close to the center ,it is on a deck over the canal. It have really nice relaxing vibe. I made cycling break for a really nice ice cold tea. The place is welcoming for families with kids ‚Ä¶

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Hidden gem on the banks of the Amstel! Perfect to dock your boat after a day on the Amsterdam canals and have some drinks. Good specialty beers too and the service is great.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text:
Good place to hang out, right next to the canal. It is not very crowded on most days and at an excellent location, right next to Intercontinental in Amsterdam.
The waiters are friendly and food is good. Cost of beers is more or less same as everywhere in Amsterdam. Be here during sunset to get a nice feel of the place.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Very nice place, with amazing view of the canal. Unfortunately, they close the terrace quite early.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Nice place to have some drinks and fun right on the Amstel.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Great place for a glass of white beer with lime in a hot sunny day ‚òÄÔ∏è

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Service was really fantastic! The location is really nice too; right on the water with a pick up point for boaters. Food for me was average but would definitely go there again for drinks and snacks.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text:
Nice place, but we were refused dinner service at 21h on a Saturday evening, with annoyed staff telling us that this is the case everywhere in NL. We politely disagreed and moved to Lempicka around the corner who serve food until 23h.
Surprised by the lack of professionalism by the staff.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Great location on the canal and lovely staff. The sweety potato fries were delicious. Highly recommended!

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Amazing service and view! Wonderful place to chill and have a good time! Would definitely go there again üôåüèª

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Location is nice along the water and across the Amstel Hotel. The kitchen took nearly an our to serve our table of 10 with simple dishes. I had the burger which was mediocre.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Nice place to drink or eat something near the Amstel

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: It's a nice bar in a good location. The waterfront view is really good. Service could be better and faster, but they make up for it with a good selection of drinks.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Nice place for good weather! You can go there by boat too.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Very expensive beer! the "half liter" was a bit larger than the normal sized beer and still double the price! I have never experienced such a thing in my years in Amsterdam!!

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Ordered chicken wings. Were ice cold. We‚Äôve sent them back and asked for new ones, we got the same chicken wings back with an ALREADY EATEN piece of chicken. After rock paper scissors, one of the girls ate the already eaten piece of chicken, which was funny. Service was terrible by the way.

Name: Amstelhaven
Review Text: Awful place. At 3 a.m. The owner shuted down the place because he "wasn't earning enough ", during ADE, where the event was scheduled to finish at 10:00 a.m. Such a bad reputation for the Amsterdam 's largest festival.
